Politics.title: Data Collection in Mobile Applications
Politics.description: We detail what personal information we collect through our mobile applications, including usage data, location (if required for functionality), and any information voluntarily provided by the user.

Politics.title: Cookie and Browsing Data Management
Politics.description: We explain how we use cookies and similar technologies on our web platforms to enhance user experience, analyze traffic, and personalize content.

Politics.title: Security in Automated Processes
Politics.description: We describe the protection measures implemented to safeguard data used in our business automation solutions, including encryption and access controls.

Politics.title: Privacy in Chatbot Interactions
Politics.description: We specify how conversations and data shared through our chatbot systems are handled, stored, and protected, and how they are used to improve the service.

Politics.title: Data Sharing with Third Parties
Politics.description: We detail when and how we may share information with technology partners, service providers, or legally authorized entities, always prioritizing the protection of user data.

Politics.title: User Rights
Politics.description: We inform users about their rights regarding their personal data, including access, rectification, deletion, portability, and objection to processing.

Politics.title: Data Retention and Deletion
Politics.description: We establish our policies on how long we retain user data in our systems and the processes for securely deleting it when it is no longer needed.

Politics.title: Policy Updates
Politics.description: We explain how and when we might update our privacy policy, and how we will notify users about significant changes in our data handling practices.

Terms.title: Scope of Services
Terms.description: We clearly define the services we offer, including mobile development, web solutions, process automation, and chatbot systems, as well as the technical and operational limitations of each.

Terms.title: Intellectual Property
Terms.description: We establish intellectual property rights related to our products, source code, designs, and content, specifying what belongs to our company and what licenses are granted to the client.

Terms.title: User Responsibilities
Terms.description: We detail the obligations of users when using our services, including the appropriate use of applications, web platforms, and automated systems we develop.

Terms.title: Limitation of Liability
Terms.description: We clarify the limits of our liability regarding service interruptions, technical errors, data loss, and other incidents that may affect the operation of our solutions.

Terms.title: Payment and Billing Terms
Terms.description: We define payment conditions, deadlines, accepted methods, refund policies, and any recurring charges related to our development and maintenance services.

Terms.title: Confidentiality
Terms.description: We establish mutual confidentiality obligations regarding sensitive information exchanged during project development and solution implementation.

Terms.title: Cancellation and Termination
Terms.description: We detail the conditions under which both parties may terminate the contractual relationship, including procedures, notifications, and consequences for active services.

Terms.title: Applicable Law and Dispute Resolution
Terms.description: We specify the legal jurisdiction governing our agreements and the mechanisms for resolving potential disputes, whether through mediation, arbitration, or judicial proceedings.
